definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[טטף]] (perh. √ of foll.; meaning dub.; Dl:Pr 46 comp. As. ṭaṭâpu, surround, encircle; Thes Di prop. √ [[טוף]] (cf. Ar. t.a0fa go around), whence [[טוטפות]] = [[טפטפוֹת]]; Kn., foll. by Klein:JPTh 1881, 673 al., assumes √ [[טפף]] tap, strike, comp. dt\gma, and thinks of actual sign or mark in the flesh as orig. meant).
